input.sentences: we went to the beach today .
we had a lot of fun walking along the edge .
there was a lot of things to see .
it was a very fun day .
output.sentences: Going to the beach is always a great idea when its sunny.
The water is clear and always warmer to play in.
As you walk down the beach you can easily look for shells.
You can also follow along the fence if you dont want to be close to the water.
Overall the beach can be a great fun day when it is sunny.
